Class SQLClassLoader

java.lang.Object

public class SQLClassLoader
extends java.lang.ClassLoader

Store and load Java classes to and from a database.

                          throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

Overrides:
findClass in class java.lang.ClassLoader

Returns:

Throws:
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - If class is not found.

loadClass

protected java.lang.Class loadClass(java.lang.String name,
                                    boolean resolve)
                             throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
This loadClass() varies from the default algorithm in that it searches in the order:
  1. Loaded classes
  2. Database
  3. Parent classes
Overrides:
loadClass in class java.lang.ClassLoader
Parameters:
name - Name of class to seek
resolve - true if class should be resolved before return
Returns:
the class object
Throws:
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - If class is not found
